title: Iridium complex modified MOFs for enhancing photocatalytic hydrogen evolution
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00184B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Yue Wang, Yifan Huang, Shihan Liu, Shuaichuan Cui, Yifan Zhang, Pengyang Deng
A novel iridium complex modified MOF was designed, which enhances the photocatalytic activity of MOFs by 2.5 times with only 0.2% of iridium complex, and exhibits good stability. It can be conductive to efficient and stable photocatalysis.
